body:
@mpbelhorn and @Paul-Ferrell reported a bug with Spack stacks for nested matrices.

The resulting error reads `dict object has no attribute 'startswith'`.

This PR resolves the error. There was no associated issue on github.

Also fixes a minor error in matrix concretization for variants with multi-word names (with dashes in the names) because that came up in the reproducer given to me by @Paul-Ferrell
title: Bugfix: nested matrices in spec lists
